page.title: 18MANOR FIELDS FARM
page.content: This farm is part of the National Agricultural Centre and owned by the Royal Agricultural Society of England. Mr.Bassett is the tenant who lives at the farm,he is also in charge of an important part of the N.A.C.The overall size of the N.A.C. is 546 ha. of which this farm forms less than a quarter. Although the entire concern has large numbers of dairy cattle, sheep, pigs, and poultry this section is almost entirely arable land with potatoes, wheat, barley and experimental cereal plots.Field sizes range from 15ha. to 2ha.Mr Bassett runs a highly efficent mechanised unit with detailed records of land use and past yields being kept in a separate office located next to the farmhouse.Main expenditure items are electricity,diesel fuel and wages.
